# unitStyle

**Instance Property**

The unit style.

## Declaration

```swift
var unitStyle: Formatter.UnitStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values are [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Formatter/UnitStyle/short], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Formatter/UnitStyle/medium], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Formatter/UnitStyle/long]. The default value is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Formatter/UnitStyle/medium].

## Specifying the Format

- **unitOptions**: The options for how the unit is formatted.
- **MeasurementFormatter.UnitOptions**: Measurement formatter options.
- **locale**: The locale of the formatter.
- **numberFormatter**: The number formatter used to format the quantity of a measurement.
